snippet: A New York pilot who landed his disabled plane on a highway for the second time in eight days said Friday he's lucky to have escaped unhurt and thankful he didn't hit anyone....

headline.print_headline: Deja Phew: Plane Lands on NY Highway for 2nd Time
headline.main: Deja Phew: Plane Lands on NY Highway for 2nd Time

lead_paragraph: A New York pilot who landed his disabled plane on a highway for the second time in eight days said Friday he's lucky to have escaped unhurt and thankful he didn't hit anyone.
